meanings.definition: The position or office of a primate.
meanings.sent1: The primateship of the group was respected by all.
meanings.sent2: She aspired to attain the primateship within the organization.
meanings.sent3: The monkey humorously declared himself the primateship of the jungle gym.
meanings.sent4: In the animal kingdom, the primateship is often determined by strength and agility.
meanings.sent5: The primateship of the zoo was a prestigious role, overseeing all the primates.

meanings.definition: The authority or leadership of a primate.
meanings.sent1: The wise old chimpanzee held the primateship of the troop.
meanings.sent2: The primateship of the alpha male was unquestioned among the group.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous monkey used his primateship to organize a banana heist.
meanings.sent4: Her primateship in the research lab made her the go-to expert on primate behavior.
meanings.sent5: The primateship of the sanctuary ensured the well-being of all the rescued primates.
